name: kl-api-service
description: API Services Angular - POST, GET, DELETE, UPDATE Http
readme:
# string-jaws The [kl-api-service](https:klokwerks.com/) library exported as [Angular.ts](https://angular.io/) Service. ## Docs API Service is design to make API calls (POST, GET, DELETE, UPDATE) using Angular 2 HTTP serice using RXJS for Observables ## Installation ``` npm install api-service ``` ## API Functions This is an Angular Serivice. Make sure to include the service in your list of providers for the Module ``` Providers = [APIService] ``` Then inject the service into the constructor ``` Constructor(private api:APIService) {} ``` The Following is how to make a GET call ``` let url = 'api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=London' this.api.getRequest(url2).subscribe( data => console.log('DATA: ', data) ) ``` ## Support Tested in Chrome 53-54, Firefox 48-49, IE 11, Edge 14, Safari 9-10, Node.js 6-7, & PhantomJS 2.1.1.
Automated test runs are available.
